mapper.select: select a.no, a.member_no as memberNo, a.brand_no as brandNo, a.title, a.classification, a.amount, a.duetime, a.type, a.useddate, b.name as brandname, b.engname as brandengname from coupon a join brand b on a.brand_no = b.no where member_no = #{no}

select b.no as productNo, b.name as name, b.price as productPrice, b.thumbnail as thumbnail, b.categoryproduct_no as categoryproductNo, c.name as brandname, c.engname as brandengname from zzim a JOIN product b on a.product_no = b.no JOIN brand c on b.brand_no = c.no where a.member_no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation values(reservation_id_seq.nextval, #{brandNo}, #{memberNo}, TO_DATE(#{restime}, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss'), 0, #{memo}, 0, #{storeNo})
mapper.select: select count(*) as couponcnt from coupon where member_no = #{no} and classification = 0
select sum(amount) as pointcnt from point where member_no = #{no}
select count(*) as productcnt from orderedproduct a join ordered b on a.ordered_no = b.no where b.member_no = #{no} and a.status = 0

select a.name, a.price as productPrice, a.thumbnail, a.categoryproduct_no as categoryproductNo , b.engname as brandengname, e.productsize as shoesize, f.productsize as clothsize, d.qty, c.orderdate, d.status from product a join brand b on a.brand_no = b.no join orderedproduct d on a.no = d.product_no join ordered c on c.no = d.ordered_no LEFT OUTER join shoesize e on d.shoesize_no = e.no LEFT OUTER join clothsize f on d.clothsize_no = f.no where c.member_no = #{no}
select amount, regdate, log from point where member_no = #{no}
